TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SignerInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 类表示一个签名者，该签名者与表示 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的 对象相关联。

span.span: The class represents a signer associated with a object that represents a CMS/PKCS #7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示的签名 可以通过消息内容或签名来进行。The signatures represented by the class can be either over message content or a signature. 后一种签名称为 *副署*。The latter kind of signature is referred to as a *countersignature*. CMS/PKCS #7 的这种实现仅支持一个级别的副署。This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature. 也就是说，可以对签名进行签名，这会形成副署，但无法再次对该副署进行签名。That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again. 此类没有公共构造函数;因此，不能对其进行公共实例化。This class does not have a public constructor; therefore, it cannot be publicly instantiated. 它是可通过属性访问的只读类 。It is a read-only class accessible from the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddUnsignedAttribute(class System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData asnEncodedData) cil managed

param.name: asnEncodedData
param.span: 要添加到文档的 ASN.1 编码属性。

span.span: The ASN.1 encoded attribute to add to the document.

summary.span: 将指定属性添加到当前文档中。

span.span: Adds the specified attribute to the current document.

remarks.format: 如果文档中已存在指定的属性，则该属性将与现有属性合并。If the specified attribute already exists in the document, it is merged with the existing one. 添加后，会重新对文档进行编码。The document is re-encoded after the addition.

span.span: Cannot find the original signer.
-or-
ASN1 corrupted data.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Certificate As X509Certificate2

summary.span: 属性检索与该签名者信息关联的签名证书。

span.span: The property retrieves the signing certificate associated with the signer information.

value.span: 表示签名证书的 对象。

span.span: An object that represents the signing certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果签名证书未通过使用属性包括在签名时间 ，则将不会返回证书。If the signing certificate is not included at signing time by using the property, then the certificate will not be returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CheckHash() cil managed

summary.span: 方法验证 CMS/PKCS #7 消息签名者信息的数据完整性。

span.span: The method verifies the data integrity of the CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information.

summary.span: 是一个专用方法，用于特定的安全基础结构应用程序。在这些应用程序中，在设置 对象时，使用者使用 枚举的 HashOnly 成员\*\*\*\*。

span.span: is a specialized method used in specific security infrastructure applications in which the subject uses the **HashOnly** member of the enumeration when setting up a object.

summary.span: 由于 方法并不涉及对数字签名进行验证，因此该方法不对签名者信息进行身份验证。

span.span: does not authenticate the signer information because this method does not involve verifying a digital signature.

summary.span: 要对 CMS/PKCS #7 消息签名者信息和副署的完整性和可靠性进行通用检查，请使用 或 方法。

span.span: For general-purpose checking of the integrity and authenticity of CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information and countersignatures, use the or methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不提供 CMS/PKCS #7 消息签名者信息的身份验证。This method does not provide authentication of the CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information.

span.span: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.

summary.span: 验证消息的数字签名。

span.span: Verifies the digital signature of the message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CheckSignature(bool verifySignatureOnly) cil managed

param.name: verifySignatureOnly
param.span: 一个指定是否仅验证数字签名的布尔值。

span.span: A bool value that specifies whether only the digital signature is verified.

param.span: 如果 为 ，则仅验证签名。

span.span: If is , only the signature is verified.

param.span: 如果 为 ，则将对数字签名、证书链和证书的用途进行验证。

span.span: If is , the digital signature is verified, the certificate chain is validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated.

param.span: 如果证书没有密钥用法或如果密钥用法支持数字签名或认可，则认为该证书的用途有效。

span.span: The purposes of the certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signature or nonrepudiation.

summary.span: 方法对消息的数字签名进行验证，并对证书进行验证（可选）。

span.span: The method verifies the digital signature of the message and, optionally, validates the certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数字签名验证失败或未满足任何验证要求，此方法将引发异常。This method throws an exception if the verification of the digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met. 如果需要更复杂的验证，调用方可以指定只验证签名，然后使用 对象来执行自定义验证。If more complex validation is required, the caller can specify that only the signature is verified and then use an object to perform custom validation.

exception.span: 向不接受空引用作为有效参数的方法传递了一个空引用。

span.span: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
A cryptographic operation could not be completed.

exception.span: 一个方法调用对于对象的当前状态无效。

span.span: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.

param.span: 可用于验证链的 对象。

span.span: If no additional certificates are to be used to validate the chain, use instead of .

param.span: 如果 为 ，则仅验证签名。

param.span: 如果 为 ，则将对数字签名、证书链和证书的用途进行验证。

param.span: 如果证书没有密钥用法或如果密钥用法支持数字签名或认可，则认为该证书的用途有效。

span.span: The purposes of the certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signature or nonrepudiation.

summary.span: 方法通过使用指定的证书集合对消息的数字签名进行验证，并对证书进行验证（可选）。

span.span: The method verifies the digital signature of the message by using the specified collection of certificates and, optionally, validates the certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数字签名验证失败或未满足任何验证要求，此方法将引发异常。This method throws an exception if the verification of the digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met. 如果需要更复杂的验证，调用方可以指定只验证签名，然后使用 对象来执行自定义验证。If more complex validation is required, the caller can specify that only the signature is verified and then use an object to perform custom validation.

summary.span: 创建副署并将签名添加到 CMS/PKCS #7 消息。

span.span: Creates a countersignature and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ComputeCounterSignature() cil managed

summary.span: 方法提示用户选择签名证书、创建副署并向 CMS/PKCS #7 消息添加签名。

span.span: The method prompts the user to select a signing certificate, creates a countersignature, and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

summary.span: 副署限制为一层。

span.span: Countersignatures are restricted to one level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CMS/PKCS #7 的这种实现仅支持一个级别的副署。This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature. 也就是说，可以对签名进行签名，这会形成副署，但无法再次对该副署进行签名。That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again. 此方法显示一个用户界面，您可以在其中为此邮件选择签名者。This method displays a user interface in which you choose signers for this message. 这要求当前进程在 *用户交互模式下*运行，这意味着该 属性设置为 `true` 。This requires that the current process is running in *user interactive mode*, meaning that the property is set to `true`. 进程通常处于用户交互模式，除非它是服务进程或在 Web 应用程序中运行。A process is normally in user interactive mode unless it is a service process or running inside a Web application. 其证书满足以下条件的签名者将显示在列表中：Signers whose certificates meet the following conditions will be displayed in the list: - 证书具有关联的私钥。The certificate has an associated private key. - 证书在其有效期内。The certificate is within its validity period. - 证书没有密钥用法或支持数字签名或认可的密钥用法。The certificate has no key usage or a key usage that supports digital signatures or nonrepudiation. 从 "我的存储" 中选择签名者证书。Signer certificates are chosen from the My store. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 要显示用户界面，需要具备以下权限：The following permissions are required to display the user interface: - 访问签名密钥需要以下权限：The following permissions are required to access the signature key: - -

A cryptographic operation could not be completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CMS/PKCS #7 的这种实现仅支持一个级别的副署。This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature. 也就是说，可以对签名进行签名，这会形成副署，但无法再次对该副署进行签名。That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 访问签名密钥需要以下权限：The following permissions are required to access the signature key: - -

span.span: A collection that represents the counter signers for the signer information.

value.span: 如果没有副署签名者，则此属性为空集合。

span.span: If there are no counter signers, the property is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CMS/PKCS #7 的这种实现仅支持一个级别的副署。This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature. 也就是说，可以对签名进行签名，这会形成副署，但无法再次对该副署进行签名。That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again.

span.span: The ASN.1 encoded attribute to remove from the document.

summary.span: 从当前文档中删除指定属性。

span.span: Removes the specified attribute from the current document.

remarks.format: 删除后，会重新对文档进行编码。The document is re-encoded after the removal.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SignatureAlgorithm As Oid
public: property System::Security::Cryptography::Oid ^ SignatureAlgorithm { System::Security::Cryptography::Oid ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前 对象使用的签名算法的标识符。

span.span: Gets the identifier for the signature algorithm used by the current object.

value.span: 当前 对象使用的签名算法的标识符。

span.span: The identifier for the signature algorithm used by the current object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SignedAttributes As CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection

summary.span: 属性检索与该签名者信息关联的已签名特性的 集合。

span.span: The property retrieves the collection of signed attributes that is associated with the signer information.

summary.span: 已签名特性与其余的消息内容一起进行签名。

span.span: Signed attributes are signed along with the rest of the message content.

value.span: 一个表示已签名特性的 集合。

span.span: A collection that represents the signed attributes.

value.span: 如果没有已签名特性，则该属性为空集合。

span.span: If there are no signed attributes, the property is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可在属性检索的集合中包含的已签名特性的一个示例 是 签名时间特性。An example of a signed attribute that might be included in the collection retrieved by the property is the signing time attribute. 签名属性与其余消息内容一起进行签名 。Signed attributes are signed along with the rest of the message content. 这意味着成功验证签名的参与方可以确信这些属性的内容可信并且未被更改。This means that a party that successfully verifies the signature can have confidence that the contents of these attributes are authentic and have not been altered. 当 相应签名者的属性不为空时，将自动生成对象和对象并将其放置在属性中。A object and a object will be automatically generated and placed in the property whenever the property for the corresponding signer is not empty.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SignerIdentifier As SubjectIdentifier

summary.span: 属性检索与该签名者信息关联的签名者的证书标识符。

span.span: The property retrieves the certificate identifier of the signer associated with the signer information.

value.span: 一个 对象，此对象唯一地标识与该签名者信息关联的证书。

span.span: A object that uniquely identifies the certificate associated with the signer information.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UnsignedAttributes As CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection

summary.span: 属性检索与 内容关联的未签名特性的 集合。

span.span: The property retrieves the collection of unsigned attributes that is associated with the content.

summary.span: 可对未签名特性进行修改，这不会导致签名无效。

span.span: Unsigned attributes can be modified without invalidating the signature.

value.span: 表示未签名特性的 集合。

span.span: A collection that represents the unsigned attributes.

value.span: 如果没有未签名特性，则该属性为空集合。

span.span: If there are no unsigned attributes, the property is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无符号特性与消息内容的其余部分一起进行签名 。Unsigned attributes are not signed along with the rest of the message content. 即使某一方成功验证了签名，但未签名的属性也可能已更改，不应将其视为具有真实性或完整性。Even though a party successfully verifies the signature, the unsigned attributes may have been altered and should not be considered to have authenticity or integrity. 可能包含在由属性检索的集合中的未签名特性的一个示例 是副署。An example of an unsigned attribute that might be included in the collection retrieved by the property is a countersignature.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Integer
public: property int Version { int get(); };

summary.span: 属性检索签名者信息版本。

span.span: The property retrieves the signer information version.

value.span: 指定签名者信息版本的整数值。

span.span: An int value that specifies the signer information version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本确定消息是否为 PKCS #7 消息或加密消息语法 (CMS) 消息。The version determines whether the message is a PKCS #7 message or a Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) message. CMS 是 PKCS #7 的新超集。CMS is a newer superset of PKCS #7.
